channel.title: Opends on DIV project
channel.description: Recent content in Opends on DIV project

item.title: How to create animated bicyclist model for OpenDS
item.description: Prepare the models Import bike model Bicycle N011211.3ds model using importer 3D Studio in Blender. Create a Human model using MakeHuman modeling tool. Export to .mhx format Import human model.mhx to blender Under default mode Combine both bike and rider model together by placing the rider on the seat of the bike. Create a two Armature bone structure corresponding two pedals to be able to move the pedals, which can be coupled so that human rider model can be moved.
